title: The Great Refreshments Plan
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Hmm.... Ruby guess about this much? What do you think, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, you packed a lot huh, Ruby-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, maybe it would be hard to eat if Ruby puts this much in? Would the sandwich fall apart....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It’ll be okay! You just have to wrap it with a cooking sheet and cut it in half from the top of the wrapper. If you do that then it won’t dirty your hand and it would let you eat the contents without it spilling them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Waaah! Then can Ruby pack more in? Onee-chan seems busy with her student council work, so Ruby wants her to take a lot of nutritions~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>To receive refreshments from her cute little sister, I’m so jealous of Dia-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh!? If you say that, Ruby is going to get embarrassed.... But, if Onee-chan is even slightly happy, then Ruby is happy too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Hey, Ruby-chan. Should we make some snack sandwiches too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Snack sandwiches....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s right. Have you ever seen a fruit sandwich being sold in a convenience store? Let’s make one with mikan and banana!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>T-, that sounds delicious~! Ruby wants to make some for everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
